name: Raben Logistics Czech s.r.o.
goal: Provider of logistic solutions to manufacturers and distributors of excised goods, incl. tobacco products.
interests: Customs, Environment, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Specifically wishing to submit insight within the Public consultation on the implementation of an EU system for traceability and security features pursuant to Articles 15 and 16 of the Tobacco Products Directive 2014/40/EU
